response.original_title: The Future Ahead Will Be Weird AF (The Ultimate AI CoreCore Experience)
response.overview: Through the synthetic voice of Adam Curtis, the movie tells the story of how humans may survive in a world that is becoming weirder, harder, and faster: dead celebrities are brought back from heaven, gen AI is rising, millionaires are hiding in the bottom of the earth. We feel stuck in a mediated reality, where love is constantly intercepted by emotional advertising, robots, and deepfakes.
response.title: The Future Ahead Will Be Weird AF (The Ultimate AI CoreCore Experience)
